txt.en:
'We need to push aside grief. It grants us nothing, and threatens everything. A Shâra's burdens will not wait.

'I have need of your services once more, my friend. Razâl and Numûru have planned a raid into Kûr Anzar this night, to weaken the All-seeing fortifications and weapons, and take back some preciously needed supplies for our people here in Urmâkh. I would ask that you join them, as you can clearly handle yourself in combat.

'Meet with them outside Kûr Anzar this night. The time grows near for our assault on Kûr Anzar directly. This mission will help hasten that day, [placeholder]. Speak with me when you are ready to leave.'
Speak with Mizâdi when you are ready to go
They've taken him into Angar Aragín. We must save him!'
Mizâdi has asked you to accompany Razâl and Numûru on a mission into Kûr Anzar to weaken the Barkhûshim.
'Be quick, be quiet and be careful. I will see you all again soon.'
Speak with Mizâdi in Urmâkh when you are ready.
Speak with Razâl near the tower in Kûr Anzar.
Speak with Razâl near the tower in Kûr Anzar
